alert.note: Alert for Columbia; McDuffie; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 9:56AM EDT until March 26 at 10:30AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern McDuffie County in east central Georgia... Southern Columbia County in east central Georgia... Richmond County in east central Georgia... Southwestern Edgefield County in central South Carolina... West central Aiken County in central South Carolina... * Until 1030 AM EDT. * At 955 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Harlem, or near Thomson, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... North Augusta, Grovetown, Evans, Thomson, Martinez, Fort Gordon, Augusta, Hephzibah, Harlem, Glendale, South Augusta, Midtown, Summerville, Augusta Mall, Daniel Field, Augusta Regional Airport, Village Plaza Shopping Center, Augusta National Golf Club, Blythe and Dearing. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 175 and 201. Interstate 20 in South Carolina near mile marker 0. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
